subject: Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters
lead_paragraph: Michael Schumacher finished fourth in his first official motorcycle event, a minor KTM series race in Misano, Italy. Schumacher, the retired seven-time Formula One champion, started on the front row but had a slow start. He eventually registered the second-fastest lap of the race and reached 127 miles an hour at one point, the fastest speed of the day. Schumacher finished 5.169 seconds behind the winner, Andrea Padovani. Schumacher.
